title: The Emancipation of women: 1890-1930
brief_description: Compilation of archival film showing early campaigns for women’s rights, and the rights and freedoms won by the end of the 1920’s. This film captures the Suffragette movement in its campaign to earn the vote. The historical advisor for this film was Arthur Marwick, Professor of History, The Open University.
